Verses: 1 kaanaan Dhesaththile Isravel Puththirar Sudhandhariththukkonda Dhesangalai Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarum, Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavum Isravel Puththirarudaiya Koththirap Pidhaakkalin Thalaivarum, Karththar Moseyaikkondu Kattalaiyittapadi Seettuppottu,
3 matra Irandaraik Koththirangalukkum Mose Yordhaanukku Appuraththile Sudhandharam Koduththirundhaan; Leviyarukkumaaththiram Avargal Naduve Sudhandharam Kodukkavillai.

4 manaase Eppiraayeem Ennum Yoseppin Puththirar Irandu Koththirangalaanaargal; Aadhalaal Avargal Leviyarukku Dhesaththile Pangukodaamal, Kudiyirukkumpadi Pattanangalaiyum, Avargaludaiya Aadumaadugal Mudhalaana Soththukkaaga Velinilangalaiyumaaththiram Avargalukkuk Koduththaargal.
5 karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittapadi Isravel Puththirar Seydhu, Dhesaththaip Pangittaargal.

6 appozhudhu Yoodhaavin Puththirar Kilkaalile Yosuvaavinidaththil Vandhaargal; Kenaasiyanaana Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaaleb Avanai Nokki: Kaadhesparneyaavile Karththar Ennaikkuriththum Ummaikkuriththum Dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Moseyode Sonna Vaarththaiyai Neer Ariveer.

7 dhesaththai Vevupaarkkak Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Ennaik Kaadhesparneyaavilirundhu Anuppugirapodhu, Enakku Naarpadhu Vayadhaayirundhadhu; En Irudhayaththilullapadiye Avarukku Maruseydhi Konduvandhen.
8 aanaalum Ennodekooda Vandha En Sagodharar Janaththin Irudhayaththaik Karaiyappanninaargal; Naano En Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Uththamamaaip Pinpatrinen.

9 annaalile Mose: Nee En Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Uththamamaaip Pinpatrinapadiyaal, Un Kaal Midhiththa Dhesam Unakkum Unpillaigalukkum Endraikkum Sudhandharamaayirukkakkadavadhu Endru Solli Aanaiyittaar.

10 ippodhum, Idho, Karththar Sonnapadiye Ennai Uyirode Kaaththaar; Isravelar Vanaandharaththil Sanjarikkaiyil, Karththar Andha Vaarththaiyai Moseyode Solli Ippodhu Naarpaththaindhu Varushamaayitru; Idho, Indru Naan Enbaththaindhu Vayadhullavan.

11 mose Ennai Anuppugira Naalil, Enakku Irundha Andha Belan Innaalvaraikkum Enakku Irukkiradhu; Yuththaththukkup Pokkum Varaththumaayirukkiradharku Appodhu Enakku Irundha Belan Ippodhum Enakku Irukkiradhu.

12 aagaiyaal Karththar Annaalile Sonna Indha Malainaattai Enakkuth Thaarum; Ange Enaakkiyarum, Aranippaana Periya Pattanangalum Undendru Neer Annaalile Kelvippatteere; Karththar Ennodiruppaaraanaal, Karththar Sonnapadi, Avargalaith Thuraththividuven Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Yosuvaa: Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaalebai Aaseervadhiththu, Ebironai Avanukku Sudhandharamaagak Koduththaan.
14 aadhalaal Kenaasiyanaana Eppunneyin Kumaaranaagiya Kaaleb Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Uththamamaaip Pinpatrinapadiyinaal, Innaalmattum Irukkirapadi, Ebiron Avanukku Sudhandharamaayitru.
15 munne Ebironukkuk Keeriyaadh Arpaa Endru Perirundhadhu; Arpaa Enbavan Enaakkiyarukkulle Periya Manushanaayirundhaan; Yuththam Oindhadhinaal Dhesam Amaidhalaayirundhadhu.
